CustomField.description: The number of hours in the date range to use when running async soql queries. This is needed to ensure record count stays below 1 million since we can't use LIMIT in an async soql query.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of hours in the date range to use when running async soql queries. This is needed to ensure record count stays below 1 million since we can't use LIMIT in an async soql query.
CustomField.label: Inbound Query Api Async SOQL Hour Range
